//: Vampire's mission are mandatory, which means they are created as subgoals of the game. BUT it must be done to allow some features of the mod.
name: Collect 30 Blood

dialogue.offer: Blood... Our main food for dark centuries. Even I almost forgot its taste, I'd like to drink it again. Bring me 30, too much but its essential in many ways.
dialogue.accepted: Okay, descendant. This won't be hard and take your time.
dialogue.rejected: If only you let me shoot your chest, this will be done easily.
dialogue.advice: Go to a hospital, get a blood drawn kit, and use it on yourself. Don't overuse it, you will die eventually if you don't wait to mend your blood back
dialogue.inquire: Drinks? You have the drinks ready?
dialogue.success: I better make snack powders from excess blood.

dialogue.describe: I want you to slay something...
dialogue.offer: Ofcourse you know bloodsucking pests on the swamp, we hate those things. Hand over 15 teeth as a proof to succeed.
dialogue.accepted: Its easy to kill a leech, but don't get bitten, bleeding is much dangerous than their teeth.
dialogue.advice: They are blind, and depends on what they hear or smell, situations will be different once you're there.

dialogue.describe: This is extremely dangerous to you... Going to do it?
dialogue.offer: You saw a hole with large blood residue? I think its their gathering place, but that thing on the depths, you need to kill it.
dialogue.accepted: Bring its blood sac, that would be a nice prize taking it down.
dialogue.advice: It's very slow, slower than a human snail, but it'll devour you and causes deadly injuries getting near it... Now get going!
dialogue.success: Damn kid, that's the mess you wanted to get. And you are still alive after that!
dialogue.failure: Ummm... I want to shoot you.

dialogue.describe: I want you for this errand.
dialogue.offer: Did you know we have been using blood substitutes for decades? Well, it's a good thing for us. Now, I want you to collect a few human blood... 15, I suppose. I want to pleasure the taste once again.
dialogue.accepted: You better do this. Sinking my fangs onto your flimsy neck is fatal.
dialogue.rejected: Talk to me again later if you want to help me.
dialogue.advice: Too obvious for you to tell this but, human blood comes from humans. Murder someone if you are desperate to collect them.

dialogue.describe: I want you to continue this.
dialogue.offer: This is rather stupid but, I want to get syringes. I don't want to crunch someone to suck blood, because the wound leaves the victim dead. To be safe and effective without killing whoever the victim is, I need 5 of it. You gave me blood and now I hunger... for a bit.
dialogue.advice: People use syringes for medical purposes.
dialogue.success: Now, I'll try this after the cataclysm!

dialogue.offer: My elderly gravestones has resurrected people, similar to the cities. As a test, give me 3 decayed bones. You may want to wander various places and look for them.
dialogue.advice: They have stone-like bloody armor under their skin, so you need to be careful provoking it.
dialogue.success: You know you can do it...

dialogue.describe: This is a bit hard for you. You still want to try?
dialogue.offer: Bloodrune... The vampire's prowess. This artifact is what I must and consume it's hidden power. Since you are here to help, you'll do this for me.
dialogue.accepted: It didn't mean I'm too lazy to look for it by myself, but you've said you are vacant for works.
dialogue.rejected: I don't force you for this...
dialogue.advice: The wastelands is full of mystery, and mystery itself how to find these.
dialogue.success: Unbelievable. I don't know how you got this, but thanks a lot.
dialogue.failure_lie: I shouldn't believe you with this.

dialogue.describe: This is the last job, you want to do it?
dialogue.offer: Since you've been helping me for a while, you need to take me to the vampire cove. Being alone is great, but its greater to be with my kind.
dialogue.accepted: Good, those tests proved yourself a good descendant, as a reward, I'll protect you along the way.
dialogue.advice: This may be a long journey, and you better own a car for the trip... And a map.
dialogue.success: Now I am with my kindred. Thank you descendant.
dialogue.failure_lie: I better have killed you, mortal.

dialogue.describe: Well, actually we have a problem...
dialogue.offer: Our kin isn't a target of diseases, but those 2 vampires at the back, they really look bad and start raging on its own, so we cage them at early state... Never knew the magic was that strong enough to kill EVEN us. I want you to end the sick vampires as your task and get their corrupted bloodrune. We know we can dispose them easily, but our beliefs prevent us from killing our own kind.
dialogue.rejected: You need to do that later.
dialogue.advice: Serious pain you'll get from fighting them upclose.
dialogue.success: Great, mortal. This oozing bloodrune will now meet its place... Or not.
